data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Get a gentle doe, as an aggressive one will be difficult to milk. She ____ not ____ away ____ you ____ you ____ her, and ____ should ____ you ____ touch ____. If ____ does ____ allow ____ to ____ her, don't ____ her. Once she becomes skittish of people, it is nearly impossible to "tame" her again.
data.partBlankContent: Get a gentle doe, as an aggressive one will be difficult to milk. She sho___ not r__ away fr__ you wh__ you appr____ her, and s__ should al___ you t_ touch h__. If s__ does n__ allow y__ to to___ her, don't b__ her. Once she becomes skittish of people, it is nearly impossible to "tame" her again.
data.fullContent: Get a gentle doe, as an aggressive one will be difficult to milk. She should not run away from you when you approach her, and she should allow you to touch her. If she does not allow you to touch her, don't buy her. Once she becomes skittish of people, it is nearly impossible to "tame" her again.
data.answer: 找一只温顺的母鹿，因为好斗的母鹿很难挤奶。当你接近她时，她不应该从你身边跑开，她应该允许你碰她。如果她不让你碰她，就不要买她。一旦她变得对人敏感，就几乎不可能再“驯服”她了。
